card.name: Adarkar Valkyrie
card.text: Flying, vigilance {T}: When target creature other than Adarkar Valkyrie dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Adarkar Windform
card.text: Flying {1}{S}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn.

card.name: Allosaurus Rider
card.text: You may exile two green cards from your hand rather than pay Allosaurus Rider's mana cost. Allosaurus Rider's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of lands you control.

card.name: Arctic Flats
card.text: Arctic Flats enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Arctic Nishoba
Arcum Dagsson
card.text: {T}: Target artifact creature's controller sacrifices it. That player may search his or her library for a noncreature artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle his or her library.

card.name: Aurochs Herd
card.text: Trample When Aurochs Herd enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aurochs card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library. Whenever Aurochs Herd attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.

card.name: Balduvian Fallen
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} Whenever Balduvian Fallen's cumulative upkeep is paid, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each {B} or {R} spent this way.

card.name: Balduvian Frostwaker
card.text: {U}, {T}: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land.

card.name: Balduvian Rage
card.text: Target attacking creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Balduvian Warlord
card.text: {T}: Remove target blocking creature from combat. Creatures it was blocking that hadn't become blocked by another creature this combat become unblocked, then it blocks an attacking creature of your choice. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step.

card.name: Blizzard Specter
card.text: Flying Whenever Blizzard Specter deals combat damage to a player, choose one - That player returns a permanent he or she controls to its owner's hand; or that player discards a card.

card.name: Boreal Centaur
card.text: {S}: Boreal Centaur gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Boreal Druid
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Boreal Griffin
card.text: Flying {S}: Boreal Griffin gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Boreal Shelf
card.text: Boreal Shelf enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Braid of Fire
card.text: Cumulative upkeep - Add {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Brooding Saurian
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, each player gains control of all nontoken permanents he or she owns.

card.name: Bull Aurochs
card.text: Trample Whenever Bull Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.

card.name: Chill to the Bone
card.text: Destroy target nonsnow creature.

card.name: Chilling Shade
card.text: Flying {S}: Chilling Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Coldsteel Heart
card.text: Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield tapped. As Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.

card.name: Commandeer
card.text: You may exile two blue cards from your hand rather than pay Commandeer's mana cost. Gain control of target noncreature spell. You may choose new targets for it.

card.name: Controvert
card.text: Counter target spell. Recover {2}{U}{U}

card.name: Counterbalance
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, counter that spell if it has the same converted mana cost as the revealed card.

card.name: Cover of Winter
Cryoclasm
card.text: Destroy target Plains or Island. Cryoclasm deals 3 damage to that land's controller.

card.name: Darien, King of Kjeldor
card.text: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may put that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Dark Depths
card.text: Dark Depths enters the battlefield with ten ice counters on it. {3}: Remove an ice counter from Dark Depths. When Dark Depths has no ice counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, put a legendary 20/20 black Avatar creature token with flying and indestructible named Marit Lage onto the battlefield.

card.name: Deathmark
card.text: Destroy target green or white creature.

card.name: Deepfire Elemental
card.text: {X}{X}{1}: Destroy target artifact or creature with converted mana cost X.

card.name: Diamond Faerie
card.text: Flying {1}{S}: Snow creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Disciple of Tevesh Szat
card.text: {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. {4}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Disciple of Tevesh Szat: Target creature gets -6/-6 until end of turn.

card.name: Drelnoch
card.text: Whenever Drelnoch becomes blocked, you may draw two cards.

card.name: Earthen Goo
Feast of Flesh
card.text: Feast of Flesh deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Feast of Flesh in all graveyards.

card.name: Field Marshal
card.text: Other Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and have first strike.

card.name: Flashfreeze
card.text: Counter target red or green spell.

card.name: Freyalise's Radiance
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {2} Snow permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

card.name: Frost Marsh
card.text: Frost Marsh enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Frost Raptor
card.text: Flying {S}{S}: Frost Raptor gains shroud until end of turn.

card.name: Frostweb Spider
card.text: Reach Whenever Frostweb Spider blocks a creature with flying, put a +1/+1 counter on Frostweb Spider at end of combat.

card.name: Frozen Solid
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.

card.name: Fury of the Horde
card.text: You may exile two red cards from your hand rather than pay Fury of the Horde's mana cost. Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

card.name: Garza Zol, Plague Queen
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever a creature dealt damage by Garza Zol, Plague Queen this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Garza Zol. Whenever Garza Zol deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

card.name: Garza's Assassin
card.text: Sacrifice Garza's Assassin: Destroy target nonblack creature. Recover - Pay half your life, rounded up.

card.name: Gelid Shackles
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. {S}: Enchanted creature gains defender until end of turn.

card.name: Glacial Plating
Goblin Furrier
card.text: Prevent all damage that Goblin Furrier would deal to snow creatures.

card.name: Goblin Rimerunner
card.text: {T}: Target creature can't block this turn. {S}: Goblin Rimerunner gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Greater Stone Spirit
card.text: Greater Stone Spirit can't be blocked by creatures with flying. {2}{R}: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and gains "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

card.name: Grim Harvest
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Recover {2}{B}

card.name: Gristle Grinner
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, Gristle Grinner gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Gutless Ghoul
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 2 life.

card.name: Haakon, Stromgald Scourge
card.text: You may cast Haakon, Stromgald Scourge from your graveyard, but not from anywhere else. As long as Haakon is on the battlefield, you may play Knight cards from your graveyard. When Haakon dies, you lose 2 life.

card.name: Heidar, Rimewind Master
card.text: {2}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents.

card.name: Herald of Leshrac
card.text: Flying Cumulative upkeep - Gain control of a land you don't control. Herald of Leshrac gets +1/+1 for each land you control but don't own. When Herald of Leshrac leaves the battlefield, each player gains control of each land he or she owns that you control.

card.name: Hibernation's End
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} Whenever you pay Hibernation's End's cumulative upkeep, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of age counters on Hibernation's End and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Highland Weald
card.text: Highland Weald enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Icefall
card.text: Destroy target artifact or land. Recover {R}{R}

card.name: Into the North
card.text: Search your library for a snow land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Jester's Scepter
card.text: When Jester's Scepter enters the battlefield, exile the top five cards of target player's library face down. You may look at those cards for as long as they remain exiled. {2}, {T}, Put a card exiled with Jester's Scepter into its owner's graveyard: Counter target spell if it has the same name as that card.

card.name: Jokulmorder
card.text: Trample Jokulmorder enters the battlefield tapped. When Jokulmorder enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice five lands. Jokulmorder doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you play an Island, you may untap Jokulmorder.

card.name: Jotun Grunt
card.text: Cumulative upkeep - Put two cards from a single graveyard on the bottom of their owner's library.

card.name: Jotun Owl Keeper
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {W} or {U} When Jotun Owl Keeper dies, put a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield for each age counter on it.

card.name: Juniper Order Ranger
card.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on Juniper Order Ranger.

card.name: Karplusan Minotaur
card.text: Cumulative upkeep - Flip a coin. Whenever you win a coin flip, Karplusan Minotaur deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Whenever you lose a coin flip, Karplusan Minotaur deals 1 damage to target creature or player of an opponent's choice.

card.name: Karplusan Strider
card.text: Karplusan Strider can't be the target of blue or black spells.

card.name: Karplusan Wolverine
card.text: Whenever Karplusan Wolverine becomes blocked, you may have it deal 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Kjeldoran Gargoyle
card.text: Flying, first strike Whenever Kjeldoran Gargoyle deals damage, you gain that much life.

card.name: Kjeldoran Javelineer
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} {T}: Kjeldoran Javelineer deals damage equal to the number of age counters on it to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Kjeldoran Outrider
card.text: {W}: Kjeldoran Outrider gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Kjeldoran War Cry
card.text: Creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Kjeldoran War Cry in all graveyards.

card.name: Krovikan Mist

card.name: Krovikan Rot
card.text: Destroy target creature with power 2 or less. Recover {1}{B}{B}

card.name: Krovikan Whispers
card.text: Enchant creature Cumulative upkeep {U} or {B} You control enchanted creature. When Krovikan Whispers is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you lose 2 life for each age counter on it.

card.name: Lightning Serpent
card.text: Trample, haste Lightning Serpent enters the battlefield with X +1/+0 counters on it. At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Lightning Serpent.

card.name: Lightning Storm
card.text: Lightning Storm deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is 3 plus the number of charge counters on it. Discard a land card: Put two charge counters on Lightning Storm. You may choose a new target for it. Any player may activate this ability but only if Lightning Storm is on the stack.

card.name: Lovisa Coldeyes
card.text: Each creature that's a Barbarian, a Warrior, or a Berserker gets +2/+2 and has haste.

card.name: Luminesce
card.text: Prevent all damage that black sources and red sources would deal this turn.

card.name: Magmatic Core
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} At the beginning of your end step, Magmatic Core deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the number of age counters on it.

card.name: Martyr of Ashes
card.text: {2}, Reveal X red cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Ashes: Martyr of Ashes deals X damage to each creature without flying.

card.name: Martyr of Bones
card.text: {1}, Reveal X black cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Bones: Exile up to X target cards from a single graveyard.

card.name: Martyr of Frost
card.text: {2}, Reveal X blue cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Frost: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.

card.text: {1}, Reveal X white cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Sands: You gain three times X life.

card.text: {1}, Reveal X green cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Spores: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn.

card.text: Whenever Ohran Viper deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat. Whenever Ohran Viper deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Orcish Bloodpainter deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.text: Flying Rimefeather Owl's power and toughness are each equal to the number of snow permanents on the battlefield. {1}{S}: Put an ice counter on target permanent. Permanents with ice counters on them are snow.

card.name: Rimehorn Aurochs
card.text: Trample Whenever Rimehorn Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs. {2}{S}: Target creature blocks target creature this turn if able.

card.text: {1}, {T}: You may tap or untap target permanent. Activate this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents.

card.text: Add {R}{R} to your mana pool, then add {R} to your mana pool for each card named Rite of Flame in each graveyard.

card.name: Ronom Hulk
card.text: Protection from snow Cumulative upkeep {1}

card.name: Ronom Serpent
card.text: Ronom Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls a snow land. When you control no snow lands, sacrifice Ronom Serpent.

card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2} plus an additional {2} for each card named Rune Snag in each graveyard.

card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}{S}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If that card is snow, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.

card.text: Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, put a 3/1 black and red Graveborn creature token with haste onto the battlefield.

card.name: Shape of the Wiitigo
card.text: Enchant creature When Shape of the Wiitigo enters the battlefield, put six +1/+1 counters on enchanted creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature if it attacked or blocked since your last upkeep. Otherwise, remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

card.text: Trample Cumulative upkeep - Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature an opponent controls.

card.text: Discard a land card: Simian Brawler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Skred
card.text: Skred deals damage to target creature equal to the number of snow permanents you control.

card.text: You may exile two black cards from your hand rather than pay Soul Spike's mana cost. Soul Spike deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.

card.text: Put a 1/1 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield. It has "This creature gets +1/+1 for each card named Sound the Call in each graveyard."

card.name: Squall Drifter
card.text: Flying {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Stalking Yeti
card.text: When Stalking Yeti enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls and that creature deals damage equal to its power to Stalking Yeti. {2}{S}: Return Stalking Yeti to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.text: Spells you cast have ripple 4.

card.name: Ursine Fylgja

card.name: Vanish into Memory
card.text: Exile target creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: Vexing Sphinx
card.text: Flying Cumulative upkeep - Discard a card. When Vexing Sphinx dies, draw a card for each age counter on it.

card.name: Void Maw

card.name: Wall of Shards

card.name: White Shield Crusader
card.text: Protection from black {W}: White Shield Crusader gains flying until end of turn. {W}{W}: White Shield Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Wilderness Elemental
card.text: Trample Wilderness Elemental's power is equal to the number of nonbasic lands your opponents control.

card.name: Woolly Razorback
card.text: Woolly Razorback enters the battlefield with three ice counters on it. As long as Woolly Razorback has an ice counter on it, prevent all combat damage it would deal and it has defender. Whenever Woolly Razorback blocks, remove an ice counter from it.

card.name: Zombie Musher
card.text: Snow landwalk {S}: Regenerate Zombie Musher.

card.name: Zur the Enchanter
card.text: Flying Whenever Zur the Enchanter attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.
